{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-05T20:54:15.000Z", "description": "

REQUIREMENTS

As a member of the team, you will:

  • Be responsible for our end-to-end machine learning pipeline, from model development to production deployment.
  • Build the team and drive the direction of the company.
  • Shape our product and culture.
  • Experience the direct impact of what you build on hundreds of millions of people\u2019s financial lives.


Required Skills:

  • Python
  • Machine Learning
  • Rust
  • NLP
  • PyTorch


The following is a big plus:

  • Fluency in Python and PyTorch
  • Experience with training and deploying models in multi-GPU environments
  • Recognized open-source contributions
  • Participation in competitive programming events (CTFs, IOI, IMO, Topcoder, Kaggle, etc.)
